body.p: {{tp371|Your task is to fill in the empty boxes based on the initial text. We recommend to proceed as follows:}}

ol.li: {{tli372|Then, go back to the initial text above. Read the text carefully and try to capture the information concerning the incomplete texts. When reading, you can simultaneously fill in the correct answers.}}
